title: Ancient Doom
summaries: Ancient Doom is one of the Lunatic Cultist's attacks in Expert Mode and Master Mode. It will only appear when the boss is at relatively low health (less than 50%). A short time after creation or upon death, the Ancient Doom will burst and send slow-moving "Prophecy's End" projectiles in all four cardinal directions. These projectiles pierce and cannot be destroyed by weapons, and they deal significantly high amounts of damage, especially in Master Mode.
